title: Amazon Deliveryperson

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -  Deliver a package to a player each night, healing and protecting them with Powerful Defense for the night. [0 uses]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  You're given one package at the start of each night.
-  You may deliver multiple packages each night.
-  Once a game, you may steal one of the packages and use it on yourself. Doing so will additionally remove all negative effects from you.

desc:
Post 2771
*You would not \*believe\* how many people order same day delivery minutes before midnight.*
